name: Claude AI Assistant
description: Integrate Claude AI into your Monday.com workspace to automate tasks, analyze data, and enhance productivity through natural language interactions.
long_description:
The Claude AI Assistant for Monday.com brings the power of Anthropic's Claude AI to your workspace, allowing you to interact with your boards, items, and data using natural language. Ask questions, create and update items, analyze data, and automate workflows - all through simple conversations with Claude.

Key features:
- Natural language interface for Monday.com operations
- Document analysis and summarization
- Workflow automation assistance
- Data analysis and visualization recommendations
- Contextual help and guidance

This integration securely connects your Monday.com account with Claude AI, ensuring your data remains protected while providing powerful AI capabilities to enhance your productivity.
